name: Just an Idea (bianchini.diogo, lcsbc123, GabrielNied, Stefan)
name_original: Just an Idea (bianchini.diogo, lcsbc123, GabrielNied, Stefan)
description:
"Just an Idea" is a game about the creative process of game development and how things take shape during the development cycle. Follow along to see how the simple concepts of our past become the full fledged games we see today!

PS: Please avoid playing in fullscreen. The game is intended to be played in the native resolution, but WebGL defaults with an option for it and it will cause glitches.

Bug Fixed Version HERE
